name: Flight School - IFLY
about: iFly College is a cutting-edge aviation training center offering professional pilot training programs, including the Multi-crew Pilot License (MPL) that directly leads to an airline pilot career. Equipped with modern technologies and advanced flight simulators, iFly provides 80 hours of ground instruction and a minimum of 200 flight hours on ultra-modern aircraft like the Cessna 172R, Diamond DA20, and Diamond DA42NG. Our instructors are experienced pilots from major Canadian airlines, ensuring top-quality training. Programs are available in English and French, and students can enroll full-time or part-time. Financial assistance is also available for serious students. With a focus on practical learning, iFly College prepares students to pilot today's and tomorrow's aircraft effectively.
